resources.string: Light: \nThis activity level is suitable for individuals who engage in light physical activity or exercise occasionally, such as walking or light housework.
Active: \nThis activity level is suitable for individuals who engage in vigorous physical activity or exercise consistently, such as running, intense workouts, or competitive sports.
Moderate: \nThis activity level is suitable for individuals who engage in moderate physical activity or exercise regularly, such as brisk walking, cycling, or recreational swimming.
This option is ideal if you want to increase your muscle mass and overall weight. It focuses on strength training exercises and a calorie surplus diet to support muscle growth.

This option aims to improve your overall fitness level and reduce body fat percentage. It incorporates a combination of cardio and strength training exercises alongside a calorie deficit diet to promote healthy weight loss.

This option helps you maintain your current weight and fitness level. It involves regular physical activity and a balanced diet to ensure you\'re consuming enough calories to sustain your energy needs.
